vendor.name: Ford Motor Company
vendor.description: Ford is constantly seeking to develop and incorporate new technology into its products and services to improve the driving experience and meet the changing needs of consumers. Through its commitment to electric mobility, autonomous vehicles, advanced manufacturing, connected cars, and smart mobility solutions, Ford is leading the way in transforming the automotive industry. Its focus on innovation has enabled it to stay competitive in a rapidly evolving marketplace and continue to be a leader in the automotive industry.
